rooms.name: Main Street
rooms.description: Welcome to Monstro City! You are one stop away from Sludge Street

rooms.name: Sludge Street
rooms.description: Sludge Street is one of the three streets in Monster City

rooms.name: Gift Island
rooms.description: The island is purple and green and covered in all sorts of coloured gifts.

rooms.name: Ooh La Lane
rooms.description: There are many buildings in this lane, but the only shop is the house store

rooms.name: Moshling Garden
rooms.description: The Moshling Garden is the place where users can plant different seeds to try and catch a Moshling.

rooms.name: Candy Cane Caves
rooms.description: The location only offers the game Moshi Cupcakes in which you can bake and decorate cupcakes

rooms.name: Observatory
rooms.description: Just past The Port on a rocky outcrop sits the Moshi Observatory.

rooms.name: Moshi Fun Park
rooms.description: The Moshi Fun Park is a place in Monster City where players play games made by gaming organizations.

rooms.name: Bleurgh Beach
rooms.description: Welcome to the one and only beach of Monster City!.

rooms.name: Puzzle Palace
rooms.description: The Puzzle Palace is a location in Monster City, where players can play puzzle quizzes to earn Rox, the currency of Monster City
